title: Understand Business Needs
description: To build the right solution, I begin by understanding the why behind the product. I work closely with stakeholders to translate business goals into clear, actionable technical requirements. This involves asking the right questions, identifying core user pain points, and aligning development work with measurable business outcomes. My approach ensures that every line of code contributes to real value.
strategies: Create user personas and customer journeys
Use tools like Miro or FigJam for mapping needs
Translate goals into epics and user stories

title: Estimate a Project
description: Accurate estimation is key to managing expectations and delivering on time. I break down complex features into manageable tasks, assess risks early, and account for both knowns and unknowns. I’m transparent about resource needs, timelines, and trade-offs, helping teams and clients make informed decisions and avoid costly surprises later in the project.
strategies: Break features into atomic tasks using Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)
Use planning poker or t-shirt sizing for team estimates
Create optimistic, realistic, and pessimistic scenarios
Leverage experience from similar past projects
Track estimates vs actuals using tools like Jira or Asana

title: Focus on UX
description: User experience is more than just design — it’s about how it feels to use your product. I prioritize usability, clarity, and responsiveness in every interface. Through user testing, iterative design, and front-end craftsmanship, I create experiences that are enjoyable and efficient. My goal is for users to feel confident, not confused, when navigating what I build.
strategies: Collaborate closely with designers using Figma
Run usability testing with tools like Maze or Hotjar
Optimize interaction flows and reduce friction
Use component libraries or design systems for consistency

title: Achieve the Best Experience
description: Delivering the best experience requires polish. I go beyond “just working” by refining interactions, improving performance, and ensuring accessibility. I listen to feedback, test edge cases, and iterate until the product not only meets requirements — but exceeds expectations. It’s about building something users love and stakeholders are proud of.
strategies: Perform performance audits using Lighthouse or WebPageTest
Implement smooth animations with Framer Motion or GSAP
Ensure responsive design across all breakpoints
Include keyboard and screen reader navigation support
Collect feedback early and iterate quickly
